Dear Ram and Satish,

Following our discussion with Ingie yesterday regarding the Glass Italia showcases, may we please proceed with marking the wall positions for the remaining four units? 

As also discussed, Ingie would like to view the showcases in context with the placement of the sofas. To support this, it would be helpful to also mark the sofa positions on the floor using tape.

For your reference, I’ve attached the relevant floor plan from the FF&E file dated May 2025.

Once the markings are complete, we can present them to Ingie for review of the proposed heights and placements.

metadata.doc_id: C1U8JZN - glass italia - markings and installation\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1U8JZN - glass italia - markings and installation\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
For your reference, I’ve attached the relevant floor plan from the FF&E file dated May 2025.

Once the markings are complete, we can present them to Ingie for review of the proposed heights and placements.

Subject to her approval, the next step will be to initiate the fixing process. This will require a specific protocol as they are delicate items: by carefully opening the showcases, photographing the contents, and preparing a report for documentation purposes.

Please kindly let Ingie know once the marking schedule is confirmed or if any support is required from my end.

Kind regards,

Linton


--------------------------------------------------

Subject: Glass Italia - Markings and Installation.

 

Dear Ram and Satish,

Following our discussion with Ingie yesterday regarding the Glass Italia showcases, may we please proceed with marking the wall positions for the remaining four units? 

As also discussed, Ingie would like to view the showcases in context with the placement of the sofas. To support this, it would be helpful to also mark the sofa positions on the floor using tape.

For your reference, I’ve attached the relevant floor plan from the FF&E file dated May 2025.

Once the markings are complete, we can present them to Ingie for review of the proposed heights and placements.

Subject to her approval, the next step will be to initiate the fixing process. This will require a specific protocol as they are delicate items: by carefully opening the showcases, photographing the contents, and preparing a report for documentation purposes.

Please kindly let Ingie know once the marking schedule is confirmed or if any support is required from my end.

Kind regards,

Linton

Dear Ram and Satish,

Following our discussion with Ingie yesterday regarding the Glass Italia showcases, may we please proceed with marking the wall positions for the remaining four units? 

As also discussed, Ingie would like to view the showcases in context with the placement of the sofas. To support this, it would be helpful to also mark the sofa positions on the floor using tape.

For your reference, I’ve attached the relevant floor plan from the FF&E file dated May 2025.

Once the markings are complete, we can present them to Ingie for review of the proposed heights and placements.

Subject to her approval, the next step will be to initiate the fixing process. This will require a specific protocol as they are delicate items: by carefully opening the showcases, photographing the contents, and preparing a report for documentation purposes.

Please kindly let Ingie know once the marking schedule is confirmed or if any support is required from my end.

Kind regards,

Linton
